name: Bleached Smog
description:
A demo about being stuck in an unnatural world and your only choice of escape is to follow the road ahead, as you drive you feel an unknown yet hostile entity stalk you.Finally you reach an abandoned house which blocks your escape route, you can feel something familiar inside drawing you closer, you are not the only one there though. It tracked you.

Development team:
-Coder-
    Me
-Music-
  Onion   https://on.soundcloud.com/QfnXZ
  Yukarium Ryuki

This is not representative of the final game,as you can see we are a small team so it takes us a lot of time to make a game.
